APIRegistry()

TtaGetEnvString(String)
TtaGetEnvString : read the value associated to an environment string if not present return NULL.
TtaInitializeAppRegistry(String)
TtaInitializeAppRegistry : initialize the Registry, the only argument given is a copy of the argv[0] received from the main().
TtaSaveAppRegistry()
TtaSaveAppRegistry : Save the Registry in the THOT_RC_FILENAME located in the user's directory.

TtaSetEnvString : set the value associated to an environment string, for the current application.

APIRegistry 
 public APIRegistry()

TtaInitializeAppRegistry 
 public static native void TtaInitializeAppRegistry(String appArgv0)
TtaInitializeAppRegistry : initialize the Registry, the only argument given is a copy of the argv[0] received from the main(). From this, we can deduce the installation directory of the programm, (using the PATH environment value if necessary) and the application name. We load the ressources file from the installation directory and the specific user values from the user HOME dir.

TtaGetEnvString 
 public static native String TtaGetEnvString(String name)
TtaGetEnvString : read the value associated to an environment string if not present return NULL.

TtaSetEnvString 
 public static native void TtaSetEnvString(String name,
                                           String value,
                                           int overwrite)
TtaSetEnvString : set the value associated to an environment string, for the current application.

TtaSaveAppRegistry 
 public static native void TtaSaveAppRegistry()
TtaSaveAppRegistry : Save the Registry in the THOT_RC_FILENAME located in the user's directory.
